1.text: Clean 4 balloons with a damp paper towel.

2.text: Blow up the balloons as large as you'd like.

4.text: Spread small spoonfuls of melted chocolate on a baking sheet.

5.text: Dip a balloon halfway with the chocolate and set it onto a circle.

6.text: Refrigerate the chocolate balloons for 20 to 60 minutes.

7.text: Pop each balloon and peel it away from the chocolate bowl.

8.text: Fill the chocolate bowls and serve them.

9.text: Heat the chocolate over low heat until it melts.

10.text: Spoon 1 tablespoon (15 ml) of chocolate into each cavity of a mold.

11.text: Spread the chocolate along the sides of each cavity.

12.text: Refrigerate the silicone mold for 8 to 15 minutes.

13.text: Turn the mold over and peel it away from the chocolate bowls.

14.text: Fill the chocolate bowls with fruit or dessert.
